DOC.brief_summary: 2 phytomedicines already in the market: GAMALINE® for premenstrual syndrome and HIPERICIN® as antidepressant will be prescribed together for treating women with Premenstrual Syndrome (PMS) symptoms and vasomotor problems for checking the advantage compared to the GAMALINE® prescription alone.
DOC.brief_title: GAMALINE®+HIPERICIN® for PMS Treatment and Vasomotor Symptoms
DOC.detailed_description: Test with 2 female groups: 25-44 years old (reproductive age) and 45-55 years old (climacteric premenopausal age) complaining about all symptoms related with premenstrual syndrome.
DOC.criteria: fertile women between 2544 years old climacteric women between 4555 years old inferior age to 25 years old superior age to 55 years old postmenopausal under hormone therapy thyroid disease under psychiatric therapy or medication history for allergies and/or hypersensitivity to any component breast feeding or pregnancy no knowledge for writing and/or reading
